oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1947-mm-dd (Jimmy Wakely guests) - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of All Star Western Theatre radio program. Broadcast date unknown, date on label and sleeve is likely a record date as it does not fit in sequence with other programs. CMF collection is missing programs for September 20, and September 27 of 1947, therefore these are possibly broadcast dates (unconfirmed). Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Terry O'Sullivan (unconfirmed), and guest Jimmy Wakely.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage; Jimmy Wakely
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Opening statement (Terry O'Sullivan) -- Cimarron (Roll On) (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Foy Willing talks -- Hang Your Head In Shame (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Drifting Along, Singing A Song (instrumental) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Ragtime Cowboy Joe (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- To Each His Own (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the radio play -- Radio play 'God's Mysterious Way' (Jimmy Wakely, cast) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: All star western theatre (Radio program); O'Sullivan, Terry, 1915-2006; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Wakely, Jimmy, 1914-1982
